Description: Hello and thank you for looking at this auction. My auctions will include fairly priced nice vintage, rare, cool and collectable guitars, amps and basses that I love playing myself. They are setup ready to rock right out of the box. All items are packed and shipped with care and full insurance. Consider adding me to your favorite sellers or checking out my other auctions if you are interested in such things! --NO RESERVE AUCTION ENDS THIS SUNDAY 1:00 PM PST, 4:00 PM EST-- 2001 Gibson Gary Moore Signature Les Paul Electric Guitar Well loved and regularly played Gary Moore Signature Les Paul and hardcase. One piece back, nice big piece of mahogany from the "good wood" era of Gibson. Guitar has exposed burstbuckers. The neck position is very warm, sounds almost vintage in its soft woolliness and attack. The bridge pickup growls with the right amount of attitude and sounds great. This guitar was played, has some fretwear and finish wear around the edges. Its a great guitar and is perfect for someone who wants a really nice sounding Les Paul that they can actually use. The guitar is aging just right and looks the part. This will be a great guitar to hang on to for a few years. Thank you for looking and best of luck bidding! Additional questions can be answered at call/text: 760-three 34-three 887 Please contact for international bidding eligibility and a shipping quote. All import duties will be the responsibility of the buyer. Guitar must be able to be fully insured.
Title: 2001 Gibson Gary Moore Signature Les Paul Lemonburst  USA Made Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: Original guitar and case, tuners have been upgraded to Grovers.  No pickguard.  Guitar is used and was played often by respectful adults.  Some fretwear, not in need of a fret job currently.  Some finish wear where your forearm rests top edge.  One dent in neck behind 3rd fret.  Overall 80% condition.  Case in similar condition, lock opens with a nice pop.
